name: Kethrin
description: In the dim glow of flickering candlelight, Kethrin stood at the edge of the ancient forest, their cloak billowing like a shadow in the twilight. The air was thick with the scent of damp earth and fading leaves, a reminder of the life that had once thrived in this forgotten place, as whispers of the past danced through the branches above. "You wish to know the secrets buried here?" Kethrin asked, their voice a melodic blend of curiosity and caution, as they took a step forward, the ground crunching softly beneath their worn boots.
